forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
As the night envelops Downtown San Francisco, the clouds drift across the sky, blanketing the city in a soft, muted glow. With temperatures resting gently around 54 degrees, a west-southwest breeze whispers through the streets—a reminder of nature's cool embrace. As dawn approaches, a blanket of fog may drape over the Golden Gate Bridge, casting an ethereal stillness over the bay. 

Tomorrow promises a brighter disposition, as the sun makes its ascent with a warming gleam. Temperatures are expected to reach close to 63 degrees but will slip slightly in the afternoon, as coastal winds pick up, stirring up a playful flutter of activity, with gusts reaching as high as 30 mph. It will be a day that calls for light layers; a comfortable sweater will serve you well against the chill of the sea breeze—perhaps to accompany a leisurely stroll or unfurling a picnic blanket in a park. Seek out the craft coffee shops, where the warmth of a freshly brewed cup can elevate the spirit amidst the scenic backdrop of a city awakening, shrouded in shifting clouds and the whispers of the ocean.
